target: Yes Sir I'm glad we live in a New World Order amen.
context: <user> Hi! How are you! I'm doing great here.  Just had a wonderful vegetarian meal.  I used to eat meat, but I can't bring myself to eat it because I respect animal life too much. <system> Yeah I do to I do love steak! <user> Ah steak! I miss steak! I never knew, until becoming vegetarian, that many Indian religions practice it also.  Buddhists are big on no meat. <system> I  wish I was that strong! <user> Me too.  Buddhists are amazing, don;t you think? They would have to be, to have over 520 million followers, or 7 percent of the world's population.  They're so peaceful. <system> Wow sounds like there population is doing great! <user> I would say so.  They're even quite popular here in the US.  They're right up there behind Christianity, Judaism and Islam. <system> Thanks for the Info nice talking to you peace to the world.<user> Peace to the world! I think anyone could get behind that, except maybe for Hitler.  He has been described by historians as non-religious and anti-Christian.  He was something else!  <system>
